summary: Comprehensive testing of Fleur Fragrances luxury e-commerce website completed. Backend APIs are fully functional with 23/24 tests passing. Frontend UI loads correctly with all major features working including navigation, product display, filters, AI chat, and responsive design.

minor_bugs.issue: Contact form expects query parameters instead of JSON body
minor_bugs.impact: Frontend contact form may need adjustment for proper integration

ui_bugs.issue: Mobile menu button click timeout on mobile viewport

integration_issues.issue: Product card click doesn't navigate to individual product detail page

passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero section and navigation
Shop page displays all 17 products with working filters
Product filtering by scent family, category, and price range
Dark/Light theme toggle functionality
AI Chat widget opens and responds to messages
AI Scent Finder navigation and quiz interface
User authentication pages (login/register) accessible
Cart and wishlist pages require authentication (correct behavior)
Newsletter subscription functionality
Navigation between all pages (Home, Shop, About, Services, Contact)
Responsive design with mobile viewport adaptation
Product card interactions (add to cart, wishlist buttons)
Footer links and social media icons
All 17 products seeded and displayed correctly
Backend API endpoints (23/24 passing)
AI features integration with GPT-5.2
Authentication system with JWT tokens
Cart and wishlist operations
Product search and filtering
Payment integration setup (Stripe & Razorpay)

success_percentage.frontend: 90% (minor issues with product navigation and mobile menu)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix product card navigation to individual product detail pages. The product cards currently don't navigate to /product/{slug} URLs when clicked. Also verify contact form integration with backend API (query params vs JSON body).
